description: Basic abstractions to work with MIDI. Used in e/usb-midi, e/serial-midi and other libraries.
name: midi

HkWR1t3D0V.description: The channel on which the message will be sent
HkWR1t3D0V.label: CH

rkf0yK2vCV.description: The value for the specified controller (0 to 127)
rkf0yK2vCV.label: VAL

@/filter-by-channel.description:
Allows only messages with a specific channel to pass through.
If a message is not channel specific (like system messages), it will still be let through.

r19Q7QBWH.description: Messages with this channel number will be let through
r19Q7QBWH.label: CH

rkDPZehaB.description: Pulses when a new message is passed through

Bk0PaidW4.description:
The second data byte.
Value goes from 0 to 127.
If the message is only 2 bytes long, this one is unused.
Bk0PaidW4.label: D2

Syt60Cd-E.description:
The first data byte.
Value goes from 0 to 127.
Syt60Cd-E.label: D1

r1TP6i_ZV.description:
The MIDI channel.
Value goes from 1 to 16.
r1TP6i_ZV.label: CH

@/mod-wheel.description: Creates a Control Change message for Modulation Wheel

rJLh54ZxyB.description: The value for the specified controller (0 to 127)
rJLh54ZxyB.label: VAL

ryG39N-xyr.description: The channel on which the message will be sent
ryG39N-xyr.label: CH

BJlshcAUAE.description: Pitch value in the MIDI format (0 to 127)
BJlshcAUAE.label: NOTE

SJZjnc08AN.description: The channel on which the message will be sent
SJZjnc08AN.label: CH

B1jj-tI0N.description: Pitch value in the MIDI format (0 to 127)
B1jj-tI0N.label: NOTE

H1fsZKU0V.description: The channel on which the message will be sent
H1fsZKU0V.label: CH

HJGnWKLCV.description: Note attack velocity (0 to 127). A NoteOn with 0 velocity is considered a NoteOff.
HJGnWKLCV.label: VEL

@/on-control-change.description: Extracts values from incoming CC messages with a specified Control number, ignores the rest.

rk_-EBxv0N.description: Pulses when a new value is extracted

@/on-mod-wheel.description: Extracts values from incoming Modulation Wheel  CC messages, ignores the rest.

r1QlG7BWeyr.description: Pulses when a new value is extracted

@/on-note-off.description: Extracts note number and velocity from incoming Note Off messages, ignores the rest.

r1uPbhgdCV.description: Pulses when new values are extracted

@/on-note-on.description: Extracts note number and velocity from incoming Note On messages, ignores the rest.

BkdAAFeuR4.description: Pulses when new values are extracted

@/on-pitch-bend.description: Extracts values from incoming Pitch Bend messages, ignores the rest.

ryjbeewAN.description: Pulses when a new value is extracted

@/on-program-change.description: Extracts program number from incoming Program Change messages, ignores the rest.

BkKh4xzxyB.description: Pulses when a new value is extracted

B1vtrhPCV.content:
Store a 14-bit integer in two bytes like this:

xxxxxxxyyyyyyy

0xxxxxxx 0yyyyyyy

HJx-JoA8RE.description:
The amount of bend to send, between -1.0 (maximum downwards bend)
 and +1.0 (max upwards bend)
HJx-JoA8RE.label: VAL

ryWW1i0U04.description: The channel on which the message will be sent
ryWW1i0U04.label: CH

HyGJ2kGe1H.description: The channel on which the message will be sent
HyGJ2kGe1H.label: CH

@/unpack-message.description: Unpacks type, channel number and data bytes from a MIDI message
